title: Mansa Musa pilgrimage to Mecca, Islam's expansion

content.question: Malian Emperor Mansa Musaâ€™s pilgrimage to Mecca in 1324 can best be understood in the context of which of the following?

choices.label: The expansion of Islam throughout Afro-Eurasia
The development of new transportation technologies
The diffusion of African culture to the Middle East
The territorial expansion of West African empires

content.answer: The expansion of Islam throughout Afro-Eurasia

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
